description: Create, update and delete volume snapshot policies.

project.description: Name of the project the volume is related to.

domain.description: Domain the volume is related to.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

schedule.description: Time the snapshot is scheduled. Required if C(state=present).

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

vm.description: Name of the instance to select the volume from.

time_zone.description: Specifies a timezone for this command.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

vpc.description: Name of the vpc the instance is deployed in.

account.description: Account the volume is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

device_id.description: ID of the device on a VM the volume is attached to.
